windows.changelog:
A new release is here with some new features, bug fixes and improvements.

New features:

  • Introduced a new, beautiful frameless window design for Windows users.

Bug fixes and improvements:

  • Resolved an issue that caused 100% CPU utilization when hovering over folders and tags.
  • Corrected the minimum width setting for the window.

Join our Discord for discussions, and feel free to email us. We love hearing from our users.

We have a lot more to show, so stay tuned.
